text: Reggio may refer to: ==Educational Model== * Reggio Emilia approach - an educational philosophy focused on preschool and primary education ==Places== * City of Reggio di Calabria, Calabria, Southern Italy * City of Reggio nell'Emilia, Emilia-Romagna, Northern Italy * Province of Reggio Calabria, in Calabria, Southern Italy * Province of Reggio Emilia, in Emilia-Romagna, Northern Italy * Reggio, Louisiana, in United States of America ==People with the surname== * Arturo Reggio (1863–1917), Italian chess player * Godfrey Reggio (born 1940), American film director * Isaac Samuel Reggio (1784–1855), Austro-Italian scholar and rabbi
title: Reggio
